original: intros. unfold Zp_invertible. intros Lt. unfold phi. rewrite phi_Zp_eq. unfold fact. rewrite mprod_factorial. rewrite Ring_PEMul_com. rewrite Ring_PEMul_exist. apply Ring_polynom.PEI. apply factorial_cancel. rewrite mprod_factorial_mult. rewrite Ring_PEMul_com. rewrite Ring_PEMul_exist. apply Ring_polynom.PEI. apply expo_p_cancel. apply Lt.
